classification.task_goal: Resolve an error in a Decky Loader plugin related to ipcRenderer being undefined.
primary_constraints: The code must properly expose ipcRenderer in the renderer process using contextBridge.
The application must be designed to work in an Electron environment if using Electron-specific APIs.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially pointed out that the ipcRenderer was undefined, which indicated a violation of the constraint regarding proper exposure in the renderer process. The user then provided the preload.js code, which was a repair attempt to ensure that ipcRenderer was correctly exposed. The assistant confirmed that the preload.js file was correctly set up, indicating that the user enforced the constraint afterward.
